DOC.criteria: Biopsy proven Adenocarcinoma Prostate Clinical stage T1c , T2a T2b PSA le 20 ng/ml Gleason Score 6 7 Age less 18 year Clinical stage T2c , T3 ou T4 Clinical Stage N1 Clinical Stage M1 Prostate Specific Antigen ( PSA ) 20 ng/ml Gleason score 8 high IPSS score 19 high alphablockers Past radiation therapy pelvis History Collagen Vascular Disease History Inflammatory Bowel Disease Bilateral Hip Prosthesis
